attributes.action: allow squirrels to be hanted humanely in the London Borough of Lewisham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to be allowed to hunt squirrels in the London Borough of Lewisham as they have become an outright nuisance and must be stopped from speading.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
